      static void validateArgsAndSetupSim​(java.lang.String[] args)
      Method to handle all the input arguments from the command line Checks to see if the right amount or arguments are inputted Checks to see if all arguments are doubles Checks to see if initial arguments result in the balls overlapping initially or being initially out of bounds Makes each set of four arguments into a ball for the Simulation Mkaes last argument if applicable to be the timeslice this sets up the variables for the simulation

      • validateArgsAndSetupSim

        public static void validateArgsAndSetupSim​(java.lang.String[] args)
        Method to handle all the input arguments from the command line Checks to see if the right amount or arguments are inputted Checks to see if all arguments are doubles Checks to see if initial arguments result in the balls overlapping initially or being initially out of bounds Makes each set of four arguments into a ball for the Simulation Mkaes last argument if applicable to be the timeslice this sets up the variables for the simulation
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

        public static boolean atLeastOneBallStillMoving()
        Method to check if at least one ball is still moving
        Returns:
        boolean true when a ball is still moving false when no balls are moving

      • collisonCheck

        public static boolean collisonCheck()
        Method to check if their is a collision
        Returns:
        boolean true when there is a collision between balls false when ther is no collison

      • isNotInBounds

        public static boolean isNotInBounds()
        Method to check to see if any balls are out of bounds
